```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
x <- read_csv("data/i_names.csv")
x |>
  summarize(num_per_mil = sum(n), .by = c(year, sex)) |>
  filter(year >= 1900) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = num_per_mil, fill = sex)) + 
  geom_area() + 
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(1900, 2016, 4)) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5))
```
